### [Initializers](/documentation/CarPlay/CPListImageRowItemRowElement#Initializers)

[`init(image: UIImage, title: String?, subtitle: String?)`](/documentation/carplay/cplistimagerowitemrowelement/init(image:title:subtitle:))Initialize an element that is constituted of an image, title and subtitle.
